abilities.name: Lord of Excess
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly **SLAANESH INFANTRY** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Excessive Vigour
abilities.rule: While a friendly **SLAANESH** unit is within 6" of this model, if that unit made a Charge move this turn, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.

abilities.name: Ecstatic Death
abilities.rule: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play. This model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
